Ride Costs

ID
{{ rideCosts.id }}

{{ rideCosts.pricePerKilometre }}
import { Component, OnInit } from '@angular/core'; import { ActivatedRoute } from '@angular/router'; import { IRideCosts } from '../ride-costs.model'; @Component({ selector: 'jhi-ride-costs-detail', templateUrl: './ride-costs-detail.component.html', }) export class RideCostsDetailComponent implements OnInit { rideCosts: IRideCosts | null = null; constructor(protected activatedRoute: ActivatedRoute) {} ngOnInit(): void { this.activatedRoute.data.subscribe(({ rideCosts }) => { this.rideCosts = rideCosts; }); } previousState(): void { window.history.back(); } }
